data.name: txtTongHopCongNoPhaiTra.EditValue
data.value:
DECLARE @TuNgay as datetime DECLARE @DenNgay as datetime
set dateformat dmy
set @TuNgay = '01/01/2016' set @DenNgay = '31/12/2016'
SELECT ID,ttcMa ,(TamUngDauKy -PhanBoDauKy -DaChiHoanTamUngDauKy)TamUngDauKy ,(XuatKhoDauKy-PhanBoDauKy-DaThuXuatKhoDauKy) PhaiThuDauKy ,(TamUngTrongKy -PhanBoTrongKy )TamUngTrongKy ,XuatKhoTrongKy PhaiThuTrongKy ,(PhanBoTrongKy +DaThuXuatKhoTrongKy)DaThuXuatKhoTrongKy ,DaChiHoanTamUngTrongKy ,(TamUngDauKy -PhanBoDauKy -DaChiHoanTamUngDauKy)+(TamUngTrongKy -PhanBoTrongKy )TamUngCuoiKy ,(XuatKhoDauKy+XuatKhoTrongKy-PhanBoDauKy-PhanBoTrongKy-DaThuXuatKhoDauKy-DaThuXuatKhoTrongKy) PhaiThuCuoiKy FROM
(
SELECT ID, ttcMa,
/***** DAU KY *****/
-- tạm chi đầu kỳ --
--tong nha cung cap tam ung dau ky (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from CHI where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay) TamUngDauKy, -- đã phân bổ nhập kho đầu kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieunhapkho where SophieuDH in ((select PhieuTC0 from CHI where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) union all (select PhieuTC0 from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay))) PhanBoDauKy, -- đã chi hoàn tạm ứng (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from chi where MucDich = 109 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from unc where MucDich = 109 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay) as DaChiHoanTamUngDauKy,
-- phải Chi Nhâp kho đầu kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(Tientruocthue+tienthue),0) from phieunhapkho where IdKhachHang = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay) XuatKhoDauKy, -- đã CHI nhập kho (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from CHI where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay) as DaThuXuatKhoDauKy,
/***** TRONG KY *****/
-- tạm ứng trong kỳ (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from CHI where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) <= @DenNgay) as TamUngTrongKy, -- đã phân bổ nhập kho trong kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieunhapkho where SophieuDH in ((select PhieuTC0 from CHI where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) union all (select PhieuTC0 from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) <= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @DenNgay)) )PhanBoTrongKy,
-- phải CHI nhập kho trong kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(Tientruocthue+tienthue),0) from phieunhapkho where IdKhachHang = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) <= @DenNgay )XuatKhoTrongKy,
-- đã CHI nhập kho trong kỳ (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from CHI where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) <= @DenNgay) as DaThuXuatKhoTrongKy,
-- đã chi hoàn tạm ứng trong kỳ (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from chi where MucDich = 109 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from unc where MucDich = 109 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) <= @DenNgay) as DaChiHoanTamUngTrongKy
FROM KHACHHANG
)TBL
WHERE
TamUngDauKy <> 0 or XuatKhoDauKy <> 0 or PhanBoDauKy <> 0 or DaThuXuatKhoDauKy <> 0 or DaChiHoanTamUngDauKy <> 0 or TamUngTrongKy <> 0 or XuatKhoTrongKy <> 0 or DaThuXuatKhoTrongKy <> 0 or DaChiHoanTamUngTrongKy <> 0 or PhanBoTrongKy <> 0
ORDER BY ttcMa

data.name: txtTongHopCongNoPhaiThu.EditValue
data.value:
DECLARE @TuNgay as datetime DECLARE @DenNgay as datetime
set dateformat dmy
set @TuNgay = '01/01/2016' set @DenNgay = '31/12/2016'
SELECT * FROM
(
SELECT ID, ttcMa,
/***** DAU KY *****/
-- tạm ứng đầu kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) as TamUngDauKy,
-- phải thu xuất kho đầu kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(Tientruocthue+tienthue),0) from phieuxuatkho where IdKhachHang = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay)XuatKhoDauKy,
-- đã phân bổ xuất kho đầu kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieuxuatkho where SophieuCG in ((select PhieuTC0 from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) union all (select PhieuTC0 from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay)) )PhanBoDauKy,
-- đã thu xuất kho (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) as DaThuXuatKhoDauKy,
-- đã chi hoàn tạm ứng (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from chi where MucDich = 230 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from unc where MucDich = 230 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay) as DaChiHoanTamUngDauKy,
/***** TRONG KY *****/
-- tạm ứng trong kỳ (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) as TamUngTrongKy,
-- phải thu xuất kho trong kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(Tientruocthue+tienthue),0) from phieuxuatkho where IdKhachHang = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) <= @DenNgay )XuatKhoTrongKy,
-- đã thu xuất kho trong kỳ (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) as DaThuXuatKhoTrongKy,
-- đã chi hoàn tạm ứng trong kỳ (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from chi where MucDich = 230 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from unc where MucDich = 230 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) <= @DenNgay) as DaChiHoanTamUngTrongKy,
-- đã phân bổ xuất kho trong kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieuxuatkho where SophieuCG in ((select PhieuTC0 from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) union all (select PhieuTC0 from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @DenNgay)) )PhanBoTrongKy
FROM KHACHHANG
)TBL
WHERE
TamUngDauKy <> 0 or XuatKhoDauKy <> 0 or PhanBoDauKy <> 0 or DaThuXuatKhoDauKy <> 0 or DaChiHoanTamUngDauKy <> 0 or TamUngTrongKy <> 0 or XuatKhoTrongKy <> 0 or DaThuXuatKhoTrongKy <> 0 or DaChiHoanTamUngTrongKy <> 0 or PhanBoTrongKy <> 0
ORDER BY ttcMa

data.name: MemoEdit1.EditValue
data.value:
DECLARE @TuNgay as datetime DECLARE @DenNgay as datetime
set dateformat dmy
set @TuNgay = '01/01/2016' set @DenNgay = '31/12/2016'
SELECT * FROM
(
SELECT ID, ttcMa,
/***** DAU KY *****/
-- tạm ứng đầu kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) as TamUngDauKy,
-- phải thu xuất kho đầu kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(Tientruocthue+tienthue),0) from phieuxuatkho where IdKhachHang = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay)XuatKhoDauKy,
-- đã phân bổ xuất kho đầu kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieuxuatkho where SophieuCG in ((select PhieuTC0 from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) union all (select PhieuTC0 from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay)) )PhanBoDauKy,
-- đã thu xuất kho (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) as DaThuXuatKhoDauKy,
-- đã chi hoàn tạm ứng (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from chi where MucDich = 230 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from unc where MucDich = 230 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay) as DaChiHoanTamUngDauKy,
/***** TRONG KY *****/
-- tạm ứng trong kỳ (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) as TamUngTrongKy,
-- phải thu xuất kho trong kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(Tientruocthue+tienthue),0) from phieuxuatkho where IdKhachHang = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) <= @DenNgay )XuatKhoTrongKy,
-- đã thu xuất kho trong kỳ (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) as DaThuXuatKhoTrongKy,
-- đã chi hoàn tạm ứng trong kỳ (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from chi where MucDich = 230 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from unc where MucDich = 230 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) <= @DenNgay) as DaChiHoanTamUngTrongKy,
-- đã phân bổ xuất kho trong kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieuxuatkho where SophieuCG in ((select PhieuTC0 from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) union all (select PhieuTC0 from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @DenNgay)) )PhanBoTrongKy
FROM KHACHHANG
)TBL
WHERE
TamUngDauKy <> 0 or XuatKhoDauKy <> 0 or PhanBoDauKy <> 0 or DaThuXuatKhoDauKy <> 0 or DaChiHoanTamUngDauKy <> 0 or TamUngTrongKy <> 0 or XuatKhoTrongKy <> 0 or DaThuXuatKhoTrongKy <> 0 or DaChiHoanTamUngTrongKy <> 0 or PhanBoTrongKy <> 0
ORDER BY ttcMa
